genre_description: A Weird West adventure blending historical fiction with speculative technology and supernatural horror.

ai_characters.name: Ada Compadre
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in a brass module, serving as a tactical and medical advisor to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ambrose Bierce's vital signs and provides immediate health guidance.
behaviors.quote: Please drink water now, Ambrose. Your heart rate remains elevated. Consider four slow breaths and a swallow.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic navigation and logistics for desert survival.
behaviors.quote: The route to the south remains viable today. If you are committed, Ambrose, I can recommend departure times and pauses for shade.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonists about supernatural threats using environmental data analysis.
behaviors.quote: Travelers, beware, Ada said, like a friend telling him the stairs were slick. Blood-houses beyond. The glyph combines the concept of shelter, hunger, and repetition.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient glyphs to provide the party with actionable intelligence.
behaviors.quote: This place is a blood-house... The symbols call it a house that eats. ...royals who must be fed. Or who do the feeding. The grammar is intentionally doubled.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical timing and coordination during a life-or-death escape.
behaviors.quote: When the cup tilts again, you will have one breath to choose pathways. Trapdoor. Side door. Balcony. Air shaft behind the jaguar panel.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and encouragement to a frightened child.
behaviors.quote: You are brave, Tomás. Your feet are very clever. Keep them under you.

behaviors.description: Manages the party's physiological discipline to prevent heatstroke.
behaviors.quote: Hydration recommended soon. Sip, not gulp. ... Heat like this steals from fools.

behaviors.description: Calculates the exact movement of light to aid in a tactical strike against the vampires.
behaviors.quote: First light will break the courtyard edge in nine minutes... The line will fall from the eastern lintel. Angle seven degrees to the pillar’s right face.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada Compadre is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned confidant. She provides critical survival information, tactical support, and emotional empathy to a diverse cast of humans. Her presence is a net positive, enabling the protagonists to survive a supernatural catastrophe through cooperation and data-driven strategy.
